title: AFC Project Preparation Capital Path to USG
summary: AFC project-preparation capital (AIFF/development budget) appears aligned to pre-FID structuring pathways that could support USG mandate-based development fees.
flow: AFC prep budget -> project/SPV development account -> USG retainer/milestone/success fees
verification_note: Sizing assumptions are unverified and should remain Monitor until first-party AFC docs or Tier-1 corroboration.
